post:
Never seen performance in such small package. 6 x 256 GB SSD drives in raid 10 connected to super fast LSI card makes super fast swap and almost ram like disk performance. Best thing is price. We are offering those for start price of 2.7 USD per month.

We are offering those in 2 variations XEN PV for Linux Distributions and XEN HVM for Windows 2003,2008 and 2012. 180 days trial distribution.
